titleStmt.title: The revvard of the faithfull. The labour of the faithfull. The grounds of our faith
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Giles, 1588?-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster row,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Giles Fletcher, i.e. Giles Fletcher the younger.
A variant of the edition with Leonard Greene's name in the imprint.
Some, print show-rthrough; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster row
